title: Bobby Surprises A Kip Moore Superfan In Studio! + Amy Was Asked For Her Phone Number + Bobby Reveals His Wedding Ring
itunes:title: Bobby Surprises A Kip Moore Superfan In Studio! + Amy Was Asked For Her Phone Number + Bobby Reveals His Wedding Ring
description:
Kierra Lewis is a Kip Moore superfan and has a big following on TikTok. Bobby brings her in to try and get her to talk to Kip Moore on the phone. Amy reveals that she was approached by someone at dinner who asked for her number. Bobby reveals his wedding ring during a segment of the mailbag!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
